f12. Which is also the default key for steam screenshots. Is there a way to change that key binding in Kerbal?

> 
> f12. Which is also the default key for steam screenshots. Is there a way to change that key binding in Kerbal?

From the main menu

Settings - input - Game.

Scroll down through the key/button bindings to find the UI section.
